name: A123 Systems
legal: Limited Liability Corp under US law
goal: A123 Systems is a global leader in providing complete energy storage solutions through advanced Lithium-ion battery cells and systems for transportation and commercial applications, offering performance, reliability, and cost savings from concept through commercialization.
euInitiatives: In 2016, A123 is opening its first manufacturing location in the EU. The plant is located in Ostrava, Czech Republic and will serve various customers in the European market, primarily in transportation applications. As an enabler of electrification in automobiles, the company has interests in economic policy, vehicle emissions regulations and other topics of an environmental nature.
